shots.query: There are three kinds of HMPs in the European Union (regulated in Directive 2001/83/EC and its amendment, Directive 2004/24/EC [12]): (i) products based on “traditional use” with at least 30 years of documented usage and without known safety concerns, (ii) “well-established use”, and (iii) HMPs with a regular approval, based on preclinical and clinical data.
